abstract: Before the government steps in, a group of advertisers is announcing a set of stricter rules for the data collected on consumers when they surf the Web or shop online.
snippet: Before the government steps in, a group of advertisers is announcing a set of stricter rules for the data collected on consumers when they surf the Web or shop online.
lead_paragraph: IN an effort to fend off federal regulation, major trade groups in the advertising industry have announced stricter guidelines on how their members use and collect online data.

headline.main: Industry Tightens Its Standards for Tracking Web Surfers
headline.print_headline: Industry Tightens Its Standards For Tracking Web Surfers

abstract: The Justice Department confirmed it was conducting an antitrust investigation into a settlement of a class action between Google and groups representing authors and publishers.
snippet: The Justice Department confirmed it was conducting an antitrust investigation into a settlement of a class action between Google and groups representing authors and publishers.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  The Justice Department confirmed on Thursday that it was conducting an antitrust investigation into the settlement of a lawsuit that groups representing authors and publishers filed against Google.

headline.main:
U.S. Inquiry
Is Confirmed
Into Google
Books Deal
headline.print_headline:
